div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, July 21, 1914. THE DEPARTURE OF CHICAGO SOKOLS[Half-tone, four column-half of a page, picture of a group of twenty men in Sokol uniform]

body.p: The great festivities of the Narodni Jednota Sokolska (National Sokol Union in Omaha will start tomorrow. The keen interest of all Sokols in these festivities was well demonstrated in Chicago yesterday. Many delegates and guests from Eastern cities arrived here to join our own Sokols on their journey to Omaha.....
Our picture shows the representative delegation of athletes of Sokol Chicago.... who will enter all the competitions.....
